alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 9:40AM MST until January 06 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected to develop this afternoon. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Fort Collins. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
